TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed beforefieldinit PngBitmapEncoder extends System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapEncoder
Public NotInheritable Class PngBitmapEncoder Inherits BitmapEncoder

summary.span: 定义用于编码可移植网络图形 (PNG) 格式图像的编码器。

span.span: Defines an encoder that is used to encode Portable Network Graphics (PNG) format images.

remarks.format: ## Remarks [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_png](~/includes/tlasharptla-png-md.md)] 格式位图支持帧级元数据。format bitmaps support frame level metadata. 它们不支持预览、全局缩略图、框架级缩略图、全局元数据或多个帧。They do not support preview, global thumbnails, frame level thumbnails, global metadata, or multiple frames. 编码在部分信任环境中不起作用。Encoding does not work in partial trust. 有关部分信任的信息，请参阅 [WPF 部分信任安全性](/dotnet/framework/wpf/wpf-partial-trust-security) 。See [WPF Partial Trust Security](/dotnet/framework/wpf/wpf-partial-trust-security) for information on partial trust.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig specialname rtspecialname instance void .ctor() cil managed

summary.span: 初始化 类的新实例。

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class.

remarks.format: ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何初始化 ，以对新的位图图像进行编码。The following example demonstrates how to initialize a to encode a new bitmap image. [!code-cpp[pngbitmapdecoderencoder#3](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/PngBitmapDecoderEncoder/CPP/PngEncoderDecoder.cpp#3)] [!code-csharp[pngbitmapdecoderencoder#3](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/PngBitmapDecoderEncoder/CSharp/PngEncoderDecoder.cs#3)] [!code-vb[pngbitmapdecoderencoder#3](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Wpf/PngBitmapDecoderEncoder/VB/PngEncoderDecoder.vb#3)]

summary.span: 获取或设置一个值，该值表示是否对[!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_png](~/includes/tlasharptla-png-md.md)] 位图进行隔行扫描。

span.span: Gets or sets a value that indicates whether the [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_png](~/includes/tlasharptla-png-md.md)] bitmap should interlace.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 交错指的是将 [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_png](~/includes/tla2sharptla-png-md.md)] 帧显示在两个字段中的过程。Interlacing refers to the process of displaying a [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_png](~/includes/tla2sharptla-png-md.md)] frame in two fields. 一个字段包含帧的偶数行，另一个字段包含帧的奇数行。One field contains the even lines of the frame, and the other field contains the odd lines of the frame. 查看时 [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_png](~/includes/tla2sharptla-png-md.md)] ，将首先显示一个字段中的行，然后显示第二个字段中的行。When the [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_png](~/includes/tla2sharptla-png-md.md)] is viewed, the lines in one field are displayed first, and then the lines in the second field are displayed. ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何使用 属性。The following example demonstrates how to use the property. [!code-cpp[pngbitmapdecoderencoder#3](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/PngBitmapDecoderEncoder/CPP/PngEncoderDecoder.cpp#3)] [!code-csharp[pngbitmapdecoderencoder#3](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/PngBitmapDecoderEncoder/CSharp/PngEncoderDecoder.cs#3)] [!code-vb[pngbitmapdecoderencoder#3](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Wpf/PngBitmapDecoderEncoder/VB/PngEncoderDecoder.vb#3)]
